ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera & lens includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon D3100 14.2MP Digital SLR Camera Body (Import) - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens (Import) - Nikon 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED IF AF-S DX "VR" Nikkor Zoom Lens (import) (all imports are backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
SLR Camera Multi-Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Neck Strap
2 UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filters - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
